00002  * hd_test.c

00006 #include <stdio.h>
00007 #include <stdlib.h>
00008 #include <string.h>

00010 #include"adflib.h"

00013 void MyVer(char *msg)
00014 {
00015     fprintf(stderr,"Verbose [%s]\n",msg);
00016 }

00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol, *vol2;
00027     struct Partition part1;
00028     struct Partition part2;
00029     struct Partition **partList;
00030 
00031     adfEnvInitDefault();
00032 
00033 
00034     /* an harddisk, "b"=7.5Mb, "h"=74.5mb */
00035 
00036     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev",980,10,17);
00037     if (!hd) {
00038         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00039         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00040     }
00041 
00042     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00043 
00044     partList = (struct Partition**)malloc(sizeof(struct Partition*)*2);
00045     if (!partList) exit(1);
00046 
00047     part1.startCyl =2;
00048     part1.lenCyl = 100;
00049     part1.volName = strdup("b");
00050     part1.volType = FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE;
00051     
00052     part2.startCyl =101;
00053     part2.lenCyl = 878;
00054     part2.volName = strdup("h");
00055     part2.volType = FSMASK_FFS;
00056 
00057     partList[0] = &part1;
00058     partList[1] = &part2;
00059 
00060     adfCreateHd(hd,2,partList);
00061     free(partList);
00062     free(part1.volName);
00063     free(part2.volName);
00064 
00065     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00066     if (!vol) {
00067         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00068         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00069         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00070     }
00071     vol2 = adfMount(hd, 1, FALSE);
00072     if (!vol2) {
00073         adfUnMount(vol);
00074         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00075         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00076         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00077     }
00078 
00079     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00080     adfVolumeInfo(vol2);
00081 
00082     adfUnMount(vol);
00083     adfUnMount(vol2);
00084     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00085 
00086 
00087     /* mount the created device */
00088     
00089     hd = adfMountDev("newdev",FALSE);
00090     if (!hd) {
00091         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00092         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00093     }
00094 
00095     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00096 
00097     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00098 
00099 
00100     adfEnvCleanUp();
00101     return 0;
00102 }
